content.webTitle: Pick of the week: London: Exhibitions

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Exhibitions
fields.bodyText: Baroque: Magniﬁcence And Style 1620-1800 V&A, SW7 Celebrating the gaudy opulence of the baroque, the ﬁrst style to have a global impact. Whitechapel Gallery Whitechapel Gallery, E1 The inﬂuential east London gallery reopens, with work by Isa Genzken and Goshka Macuga. Kuniyoshi Royal Academy, W1 Tattooed warriors and supermen: Japanese woodcuts by one of the great artists of the ﬂoating world. Jim Lambie Sadie Coles At South Audley Street, W1 Artist famed for his bedazzling ﬂoor installations returns with a new work called The Strokes. Christian Marclay Cafe Oto, E8 Punk artist famed for his cut-and-paste ﬁlm collaborations with Steve Beresford, John Butcher and Okkyung Lee.
